strings:
<voice_0x01000B40><se_def>*: I don't know you!
What are you doing in here!?
<voice_0x01000B41><se_def>*: You need special permission to enter here.

<voice_0x01000B42><se_def>*: Leave! Now!
Unless you want to die by a Templar's sword!
<voice_0x01000B43><se_def>*: I ordered you to keep strangers out, not to be rude. We have a reputation. Do you want to sully the name of the Templars!?

<voice_0x01000B45><se_def>Marcello: I apologise for the heavy-handedness of my men.
We've had some trouble with strangers of late.

<voice_0x01000B46><se_def>Marcello: Our duty is to protect the abbey.
We cannot permit nameless travellers to
wander around at will.

<voice_0x01000B47><se_def>Marcello: Matters within the abbey are trouble enough.
But that's no concern of yours!

<voice_0x01000B48><se_def>Marcello: These are the Templars' quarters anyway.
I trust you have no business here,
so I would ask you to leave.

<voice_0x01000B49><se_def>Marcello: I warn you, my men are ill at ease.
I may not be able to stop them next time.

<voice_0x01000B4A><se_def>*: You again? What is it this time?
...What? You've got Angelo's ring?

<voice_0x01000B4B><se_def>*: Hmph!
Put it up as credit at the pub again, did he?
That boy's a disgrace!

<voice_0x01000B4D><se_def>*: Very well, then!
Angelo's inside.
Now hurry up!
